title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
The biggest credit-reporting firms will strip tens of billions of dollars in medical debt from consumers' credit reports, erasing a black mark that makes it harder for millions to borrow.

An Australian regulator is suing Meta Platforms, accusing it of not doing enough to remove scam ads from Facebook that featured public figures promoting cryptocurrency.

GM said it is buying out SoftBank Vision Fund's stake in its Cruise division for $2.1 billion, roughly four years after the investment firm joined the car maker in betting on driverless-car technology.

Porsche and Apple have held early discussions about potential joint projects, the sports-car maker's chief executive said.

What's News: Business & Finance
